items.question: How long does deployment take?
items.answer: Typical deployment takes 2-4 weeks, including data connector configuration and user training. We can have a proof-of-concept running in days.

items.question: What data sources can ANDEXA connect to?
items.answer: ANDEXA connects to virtually any structured data source: Excel, SQL databases, Oracle, HIS/EHR systems, ERP platforms, HL7/FHIR feeds, and REST APIs.

items.question: Is ANDEXA compliant with Saudi regulations?
items.answer: Yes. ANDEXA is designed for PDPL (Personal Data Protection Law) compliance and NCA ECC (Essential Cybersecurity Controls) alignment. Data never leaves your premises.

items.question: Do users need technical training?
items.answer: No. ANDEXA uses natural language—users simply type questions in Arabic or English. If you can send a text message, you can use ANDEXA.

items.question: What about data security?
items.answer: ANDEXA deploys 100% on-premises or in your private cloud. There is zero data egress. Role-based access control ensures users only see authorized data. Full audit logging is included.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: We offer annual licensing with unlimited queries—no per-token fees. Contact us for a quote based on your organization's needs.

items.question: Can ANDEXA integrate with our existing BI tools?
items.answer: Yes. ANDEXA complements existing dashboards (Tableau, Power BI) by adding natural language query capabilities and automating report generation.
